title: Scary Stories #1: Eek! (CRE304)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our early years! In the fourth episode of our third season, Ben Garant of Reno 911! as well as Pete Holmes, Kumail Nanjiani, Ptolemy Slocum, JC Cassis, Heidi Rosebrugh and more share scary stories in our first Halloween episode.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Heidi Rosebrugh, Kumail Nanjiani, Pete Holmes, Ptolemy Slocum, JC Cassis, Nigel Simmons, Fever Ray, Jonathan Geer, Jordan Cooper, David Buchs, Vincent Price, Dan Rosen, Musical Palsey)
